name: Original Creamy Sauce
instructions: Blend base ingredients with chicken bone broth until smooth
Pour mixture into pan and cook on medium heat
Add yogurt, cream cheese, ranch seasoning, and whey protein
Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally
When nearly set, flip with plate to cook other side
Add mozzarella on top and cover until melted

name: Marinara Style
instructions: Blend base ingredients with chicken bone broth until smooth
Pour mixture into pan and cook on medium heat
Add marinara sauce, garlic, Italian seasoning, and whey protein
Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally
When nearly set, flip with plate to cook other side
Add mozzarella on top and cover until melted

name: Light Alfredo
instructions: Blend base ingredients with almond milk until smooth
Pour mixture into pan and cook on medium heat
Add alfredo sauce, nutritional yeast, garlic powder, and whey protein
Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally
When nearly set, flip with plate to cook other side
Add mozzarella on top and cover until melted

name: Fresh Herb
instructions: Blend base ingredients with olive oil until smooth
Pour mixture into pan and cook on medium heat
Add blended herbs, garlic, lemon juice, and whey protein
Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally
When nearly set, flip with plate to cook other side
Add mozzarella on top and cover until melted

name: BBQ Style
instructions: Blend base ingredients with apple cider vinegar until smooth
Pour mixture into pan and cook on medium heat
Add BBQ sauce, spices, and whey protein, mixing well
Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally
When nearly set, flip with plate to cook other side
Add mozzarella on top and cover until melted

name: Sharp Cheddar
instructions: Blend base ingredients with chicken bone broth until smooth
Pour mixture into pan and cook on medium heat
Add cheddar cheese, yogurt, mustard powder, and whey protein
Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally
When nearly set, flip with plate to cook other side
Add mozzarella on top and cover until melted

name: Spicy Mexican
instructions: Blend base ingredients with chicken bone broth until smooth
Pour mixture into pan and cook on medium heat
Add salsa verde, taco seasoning, jalapeño, and whey protein
Cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally
When nearly set, flip with plate to cook other side
Add mozzarella on top and cover until melted

name: Creamy Sun-Dried Tomato
instructions: Season and cook chicken chunks with garlic powder until golden
Make omelette with eggs and fresh spinach
Mix light cream cheese with chopped sun-dried tomatoes and basil
Layer cooked chicken on omelette, add creamy tomato sauce
Top with mixed greens, lentils, pumpkin seeds, and chia seeds
Fold and serve hot

name: Honey Mustard
instructions: Cook chicken chunks, mixing in honey mustard and dijon while cooking
Prepare omelette with eggs, cheddar cheese, and spinach
Add honey mustard chicken mixture to omelette
Top with mixed greens, lentils, pumpkin seeds, and chia seeds
Fold and serve hot

name: Spicy Chipotle
instructions: Cook chicken chunks with chipotle sauce and smoked paprika
Make omelette with cheddar cheese and fresh spinach
Add spicy chipotle chicken to omelette
Top with mixed greens, lentils, pumpkin seeds, and chia seeds
Fold and serve hot

name: Garlic Parmesan
instructions: Season and cook chicken chunks with garlic powder
Make omelette with parmesan cheese and spinach
Add garlic chicken to omelette
Drizzle with light alfredo sauce
Top with mixed greens, lentils, pumpkin seeds, and chia seeds
Fold and serve hot

name: Creamy Basil
instructions: Cook chicken chunks until golden
Make omelette with mozzarella and fresh spinach
Mix light cream cheese with chopped fresh basil
Spread basil cream cheese over chicken in omelette
Top with mixed greens, lentils, pumpkin seeds, and chia seeds
Fold and serve hot

name: Spicy Cajun
instructions: Cook chicken chunks with Cajun seasoning and diced bell peppers
Make omelette with pepper jack cheese and spinach
Add spicy Cajun chicken and peppers to omelette
Top with mixed greens, lentils, pumpkin seeds, and chia seeds
Fold and serve hot
